acceptedAnswer.text: AI Trading uses artificial intelligence, machine learning, and neural networks to automate trading decisions and execute trades based on market data analysis.
We support MetaTrader 4 (MT4), MetaTrader 5 (MT5), NinjaTrader, TradingView, and cTrader platforms with our expert advisors and trading indicators.
We offer both free and premium trading tools. Many indicators and educational resources are available for free on our GitHub repository.
